p: The material was processed fresh, immediately after arriving at the laboratory, between 2 h and 4 h after being collected. The plant material was submitted to hydrodistillation for 4 h in a Clevenger-type apparatus. Subsequently, moisture was removed from the collected essential oil by the addition of anhydrous sodium sulphate, and finally, it was stored in amber-sealed vials at 4 Â°C to protect it from light until being used in the subsequent analysis [ 51].
